::FireBlade::
::FireBlade waited for an answer from AutoFire..He once again opened
the comm-link and inquired if Autofire had heard his request.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireBlade::
> "Yes..." he replied half thinking rather than giving full atention..He
> could not wait to fight once again. Even tho he was not a soldier bot
> he loved fighting. and he was great at it too.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > Sinnertwin awnsers to Fireblades thoughts on earth. "Yess, no water on
> > Cybertron, and carbon life forms suck" he said, short and sweet.
